item.description:
The Tap is opening their outside deck and DCMS is playing so lets go out and welcome summer in with a great night of fun, music and dancing.

As always, DCMS is a great band to listen and dance to. 

Don’t Call Me Shirley plays contemporary, popular, and classic hits from the 1950’s to today’s favorites.  DCMS is "a wicked fun band" that entertains music lovers with a wide range of tastes from Elvis Presley & Johnny Cash of the 50' to The Beatles & The Stones of the 60's, from The Doobie Brothers & Creedence Clearwater Revival of the 70's to John Mellencamp & Tommy Tutone of the 80's, from Sublime & Bare Naked Ladies of the 90's to Matchbox 20 & Train of the 00's. 

There is no cover to enjoy this great night of fun.  This will be a rain or shine event, if it rains the band will be playing inside.  So get those dancing shoes on, the glitter shirt ready and be prepared to have a great time.

 

Hope to see you at the tap

Donna & janet
item.why: Because DCMS is an awesome band and the Tap is a great place to have fun.
item.name: Don't Call Me Shirley - Opening Night for the outside deck at The Tap
